alert.note: Alert for Eastern Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued May 02 at 2:55PM EDT until May 03 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: .Snow will continue through Wednesday. Wet snow combined with gusty winds will put stress on trees that have already developed leaves. Power outages may result. Snow accumulations will primarily occur overnight with melting during the daytime hours, and will be largely elevation dependent. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow. Additional snow accumulations between 3 and 6 inches, with 6 to 8 inches possible in the highest elevations. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Tucker County. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening and Wednesday morning commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
